芣字的基本解释

芣
fú
〔芣苢〕古书上指“车前”，多年生草本植物，开淡绿色花，叶和种子可入药。

芣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》縛謀切，平尤，奉。］
“衃2”的被通假字。
(1)见“芣苢”。
(2)山名。在今河南省巩县北。

芣字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芣； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1019第26
【唐韻】縛謀切【集韻】房尤切【正韻】房鳩切，?音浮。【爾雅·釋草】，苤苢馬舄，馬舄車前。郭璞註大葉長穗，江東呼爲蝦蟆衣。【詩·周南】采采苤苢。陸璣疏一名當道。喜在牛跡中生。幽州人謂之牛舌草，可鬻作茹，大滑，其子治婦人難產。【關尹子·九藥篇】聖人大言金玉，小言桔梗芣苢。　又山名。【鄭語】主芣騩而食溱洧。【註】芣騩山在密縣。　又【集韻】俯九切，音缶。芘芣，荍也。　又芳無切，音敷。从䓏省。華盛貌。

考證：〔【玉篇】芣苢，馬舄。【詩·周南】采采芣苢。【郭璞疏】大葉長穗，江東呼爲蝦蟆衣。【陸璣疏】馬舄，一名車前〕　謹按毛詩無郭璞疏。謹將此三十六字改爲：爾雅釋草，苤苢馬舄，馬舄車前。郭璞註大葉長穗，江東呼爲蝦蟆衣。詩周南采采苤苢。陸璣疏一名當道。

芣
Basic explanation of words
芣
fú
〔芣苢〕In ancient books, it refers to "Plants", a perennial herb with light green flowers, leaves and seeds used as medicine.
芣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Bin Mouqie, Pingyou, Feng. ]
"衃2" was passed falsely.
(1) See "芣苢".
(2) The name of the mountain. In today's north of Gongxian County, Henan Province.
芣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　芣; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1019 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Bound Mou cut [Ji Yun] Fang Youqi [Zheng Yun] Fang Dove cut, sound floating. 【Erya·Shucao】, kohlrabi horses, horses and carts in front. Guo Pu noted the big leaves and long spikes, and Jiang Dong called for the prawns' clothes. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Collect kohlrabi. Lu Ji was in charge. Happy to be born in the cattle trail. The people of Youzhou call it bugloss, but it can be ruined and slippery, and its son cures a woman's dystocia. 【Guan Yinzi·Nine Medicines】The saint’s words are golden, and the small words are platycodon grandiflorum.　Also the name of the mountain. [Zheng Yu] The main body is rich and full of food. [Note] Qianxian Mountain is in Mixian County.　[Jiyun] Nine cuts down, sound fou. Pyrene, Xun also.　Fang without cutting, Otobu. From the province. Huasheng appearance. Textual research: [[Jade articles] 芣苢，马舄. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Collecting and picking 芣芣. [Guo Pushu] Big leaves and long spikes, Jiangdong calls for prawns' clothes. [Lu Jishu] Ma Jia, in front of a car] 　 I would like to press Mao Shiwu Guo Pushu. I would like to change this thirty-six word to: Erya Shicao, kohlrabi horse rooster, horse rooster car front. Guo Pu noted the big leaves and long spikes, and Jiang Dong called for the prawns' clothes. Poetry Zhou Nan picks and picks kohlrabi. Lu Ji was in charge.
